HediffDef.label: Dragons aura
HediffDef.description: A powerful psychic ability that psychically warps that target's perception and bodily function, making them nigh unstoppable temporarily. Though there is a chance that it may cause severe brain damage!

li.label: Dragons aura
li.description: I can feel the dragon spirit within me!

HediffDef.label: Dragon scales
HediffDef.description: A powerful psychic ability that envelopes the target with an invisible forcefield, which renders the target invincible while lowering their mobility temporarily.

HediffDef.label: Empress decree
HediffDef.description: A powerful psychic ability that warps the target's physiology, bestowing them with increased productivity and a massive mood buff temporarily. It can also stop any current mental breaks that the target is having.

li.label: Empress decree
li.description: I am to give it my all and work hard as the empress decreed!

HediffDef.label: Berserker aura
HediffDef.description: A powerful psychic ability that psychically warps that target's physique, bolstering their muscle tissues which allows them to become a god of melee temporarily, though they would be in a beserk state in return.

HediffDef.label: Adrenaline
HediffDef.description: A sudden burst of chemical hormone injected by the MK.1 combat module. The designated target will recieve an significant boost for all capacities, reduced bleeding, and immune to stager temporarily.

HediffDef.label: Adrenaline EX
HediffDef.description: A sudden burst of chemical hormone injected by the Executive combat module. The designated target will recieve an explosive boost for all capacities, reduced bleeding, immune to stager, and increased damage resistance temporarily.

li.label: Extreme adrenaline
li.description: YOU CAN'T STOP ME!! IT'S FUTILE!!!!

li.label: Omnipotence high
li.description: From the moment I understood the weakness of my flesh, it disgusted me. I craved the strength and certainty of super steel. I aspired to the purity of the omnipotent machine. Your kind cling to your flesh as if it will not decay and fail you.

HediffDef.label: archotech band node (tuned)
HediffDef.description: This mechanitor's bandwidth and control group is being increased exponentialy thanks to the influence of an archotech band node structure.

li.label: Soothing archotech band node
li.description: The soothing hym from the archotech band node fills me with absolute joy, it feels great!

li.label: supreme apocriton emanator soothe
li.description: I can't believe we have killed such a mechanical being, it felt so unreal but it felt realy good.

li.label: observed supreme apocriton trophy
li.description: The masters of this colony defeated that thing. Pissing them off would only get my ass killed.

HediffDef.label: Mechanoid ranger boost
HediffDef.description: This mechanoid's ranged capacities have been amplified greatly by a nearby mechanoid ranger booster building.

HediffDef.label: Psychic rejuvenate
HediffDef.description: A benefitial side effect after using the psychic rejuvenator serum.

HediffDef.label: Healing boost
HediffDef.description: An advanced medicinal compound that boosts the body's natural healing ability.

HediffDef.label: Overdrive
HediffDef.description: An advanced biological state where the archotech heart implant enters full overdrive, influencing the biological function of the human body to the extreme, that would in turn, increase their combat efficiency through leaps and bounds.

HediffDef.label: mass psychic burden
HediffDef.description: Psychically mass-induced difficulty in locomotion.

HediffDef.label: Excessive bleeding
HediffDef.description: An extreme condition caused by contact of sharp objects.

HediffDef.label: Shock pain
HediffDef.description: None life threatning condition that amplify the victim's pain threshold.

HediffDef.label: Health blight
HediffDef.description: Incredibly life threatning condition that targets the victim's immune system, making them incredibly suseptible to disease.

HediffDef.label: Corpse explosion disease
HediffDef.description: A terrible disease where a victim's cells were rotted to the point of them exploding upon death.

HediffDef.label: Inflammable
HediffDef.description: A dangerous condition that leaves the victim vulnerable to fire.

HediffDef.label: Incendiary body
HediffDef.description: A dangerous condition caused by unstable chemicals, which causes the victims body increadibly vulnerable to fire.
A health condition that raises the victim's hunger and rest needs.
HediffDef.label: Vitality drain
Armor breaker
HediffDef.description: The victim's armor are now null and void once inflicted with this condition.

HediffDef.label: Instant kill
HediffDef.description: Death.

HediffDef.label: Frostbite
HediffDef.description: A debilitating condition that lowers the victim's move speed and manipulation due to frostbite.

HediffDef.label: Traveler's jumpsuit
HediffDef.description: A pleasant effect after wearing a traveler's jumpsuit.

li.label: Wearing a traveler's jumpsuit
li.description: Not too tight and not too loose, i like it.

HediffDef.label: Reinforced jumpsuit
HediffDef.description: A pleasant effect after wearing a reinforced jumpsuit.

HediffDef.label: Utility jumpsuit
HediffDef.description: A pleasant effect after wearing a utility jumpsuit.

HediffDef.label: Enforcer melee backpack
HediffDef.description: A benefitial effects after wearing the enforcer melee backpack.

HediffDef.label: Enforcer ranger backpack
HediffDef.description: A benefitial effects after wearing the enforcer ranger backpack.

HediffDef.label: traveler's backpack
HediffDef.description: A benefitial effects after wearing the traveler's backpack.

HediffDef.label: Enforcer duster
HediffDef.description: A benefitial effects after wearing an enforcer duster.

HediffDef.label: Enforcer jumpsuit
HediffDef.description: A benefitial effects after wearing an enforcer jumpsuit.

HediffDef.label: Enforcer helmet
HediffDef.description: A benefitial effects after wearing an enforcer helmet.

HediffDef.label: Enforcer gloves
HediffDef.description: A benefitial effects after wearing an enforcer gloves.

HediffDef.label: Force invoked rage
HediffDef.description: A sudden invocation of rage caused by a berserk psychic bullet.

HediffDef.label: Forced confusion
HediffDef.description: A forced mental state caused by a confusion psychic bullet.

HediffDef.label: Severe health blight
HediffDef.description: An increadibly dangerous health condition that sets the target's capacities to 35% temporarily, along with an increased pain sensitivity and severe movement reduction.

HediffDef.label: enhanced combat module effect
HediffDef.description: Mechanoids enhanced with this module will recieve a significant boost in combat.

HediffDef.label: Iron lung
HediffDef.description: A serious health condition that lowers consciousness, sight, and breathing to 35%, and recieving increased pain sensitivity due to inhaling heavy amounts of iron sand.

HediffDef.label: Armor breaker EX
HediffDef.description: The victim's armor are now null and void once inflicted with this condition.

HediffDef.label: Greater healing boost
HediffDef.description: A powerful psychic effect that can greatly heal nearby targets.

HediffDef.label: Fortify defense
HediffDef.description: A powerful psychic effect that fortifies a single target's defense.

HediffDef.label: Raise attack
HediffDef.description: A powerful psychic effect that raises a single target's attack DPS.

HediffDef.label: thunder god boost
HediffDef.description: By emiting a psychic aura to nearby allies, the caster can bestow them with a morale boost.

HediffDef.label: thunder god buff
HediffDef.description: Overall morale were fortified thanks to being near someone who is using the morale boost aura.

li.label: Fortified morale
li.description: I'm filled with hope and ready to face what tomorrow will bring!

HediffDef.label: Overclock
HediffDef.description: A special condition unique to modified militors that raises their movespeed and ranged combat potential.

HediffDef.label: Reinforce defense
HediffDef.description: A special effect for heavy type militors where it can reinforce their own defense for a fixed period of time.

HediffDef.label: First aid
HediffDef.description: Temporarily seal the target's open wound, preventing them from bleeding any further.

HediffDef.label: Immunogen
HediffDef.description: An immuno-enhancement solution that raises the patient's immunity against ailments.

HediffDef.label: Regenerative serum
HediffDef.description: A benefitial effect from the regen serum where it can heal severe wounds.

HediffDef.label: Morphine shot
HediffDef.description: A benefitial effect where the subject can temporarily feel no pain.

HediffDef.label: Cure-all
HediffDef.description: A benefitial effect after being injected by a cure-all serum, which possess miraculous healing properties.

HediffDef.label: Increased accuracy
HediffDef.description: An benefitial effect that grants the target increased accuracy.

HediffDef.label: Nanite assault
HediffDef.description: A serious health condition that lowers consciousness, sight, and breathing to 35%, due to harmful nanites present in the body.

HediffDef.label: Magnesium burn
HediffDef.description: A magnesium burn.

HediffDef.label: Gamma beam burn
HediffDef.description: A gamma beam burn.

HediffDef.label: Corrosion
HediffDef.description: A corrosive burn.

HediffDef.label: Corrosion
HediffDef.description: A corrosive burn.

HediffDef.label: radiation poisoning
HediffDef.description: A health hazard byproduct emited by the EMI dynamo ship.

HediffDef.label: neurotoxin buildup
HediffDef.description: Artificial toxic hazards that invaded the brain due to being exposed to toxic rain.

HediffDef.label: heat nullifying nanites
HediffDef.description: Dangerous nanites that slowly nullifies the victim's cold resistance.

HediffDef.label: cold nullifying nanites
HediffDef.description: Dangerous nanites that slowly nullifies the victim's heat resistance.

HediffDef.label: anti-organic toxin
HediffDef.description: Toxin secreting nanites found in anti-organic fallouts. Symptoms includes, but not limited to, increased pain, slow degredation of the body, lowered immune system, and death.

HediffDef.label: anti-organic disease
HediffDef.description: An infectious disease caused by anti-oraganic nanites. Symptoms includes, but not limited to, increased pain, slow degredation of the body, and lowered immune system.

HediffDef.label: rage virus
HediffDef.description: Rage-inducing nanites that hijacks the victim's brain, boosting their combat capabilities while plunging them in an unbridled amount of rage.
